Introduction

Intro*Plug-Ins *Design Revolution* Usability Focus* A Mobile Future*

The Future That Wasn't* The State of Today* Coming Full Circle* End of Days

Over the past 20 years, Flash evolved with the ups and downs of web development. Whether it was used to display animation, or provide complex web tools, Flash made the internet more interesting and usable.

Over the past 20 years, the web has changed significantly. Whether the internet was becoming faster, or getting more standardized, Flash was there until the internet grew to not need it anymore.
